data.description: An introduction to the use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) technology in the construction industry. Gain experience in using 3D  4D modeling software to model and coordinate building designs.
data.title: BUILDING INFORMATION MODELING (BIM)

data.description: Graphical communication including lettering, drawing equipment and techniques; geometric constructions, orthographic projections, technical sketching, isometric views, descriptive geometry, and computer-aided design drawing, with applications specific to civil engineering.
data.title: CIVIL ENGINEERING GRAPHICS
